price: They said, “Have you come to turn us away from our gods? Then bring us what you are threatening us with, if you are truthful.”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتَأۡفِكَنَا عَنۡ ءَالِهَتِنَا فَأۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
